page.title: 08ECOLOGY OF PIETHORNE
page.content:
In the{Piethorne Valley}there is a lot of{pollution}from a dye mill in{Ogden which is on Piethorne's door step .The {walls}around Piethorne were a{sandy {colour}because they were made of {sandstone,}but now they are{black. Close by is a wood but the trees did not{grow well}because of the pollution in the valley.Now the trees are a {shelter}to the{animals}and you can be very sure that if you are in the wood an{owl}would be looking at you.There has not been a lot of{acid {rain}in the area around Piethorne. {Facilities}are available,these include a car park,a toilet and an office where{wardens}are based.The wardens like to help you and there are a lot of walks for people to enjoy.
R/H/19/6/85
